data.comment: Wesli De Cremer starts the match. Mouscron with the kick-off in Mouscron.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, Brugge have kicked-off the second half at Stade Le Canonnier.
Philippe Clement (Brugge) is making a first substitution, with Siebe Schrijvers replacing David Okereke.
Imad Faraj is replacing Charles-Andreas Brym for Mouscron at Stade Le Canonnier.
In the minute 61, The away team have replaced Michael Krmencik with Youssouph Badji. This is the second substitution made today by Philippe Clement.
Jorge Simao is making the team's second substitution at Stade Le Canonnier with Capita replacing Beni Badibanga.
Mouscron's Capita has been booked in Mouscron.
In the minute 78, Philippe Clement (Brugge) is making a third substitution, with Emmanuel Dennis replacing Noa Lang.
Dimitri Mohamed (Mouscron) gets a yellow card.
Odilon Kossounou is booked for the away team.
The match is over. Final score 0-0.
Jorge Simao is making the team's third substitution at Stade Le Canonnier with Harlem Gnohere replacing Nuno Da Costa.
Clinton Mata for Brugge has been booked by Wesli De Cremer and receives a first yellow card.
